definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: " he then rented it out and moved to Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: ，他將這棟別墅租賃出去後搬到了開普敦。

sentences.english: One man is walking along the beach in Camptown, South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，一個人在南非開普敦海灘漫步。

sentences.english: Argentina's coach Diego Maradona is perplexed in Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷教練迪亞哥馬拉多納在開普敦賽場上充滿無奈。

sentences.english: Lightning forks and rejoins itself over Table Mountain and Lion's Head in Cape Town, South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 南非開普敦桌山和獅子頭上空的閃電枝叉匯合成環形。

sentences.english: I learn that this boy is in business in Capetown.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說這小夥子在開普敦做生意。

sentences.english: A tourist on Signal Hill looks at a sunset in Cape Town, South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 一名遊客在開普敦錫格納爾山看着日落，南非。

sentences.english: I got a call from a woman who wanted to go to Capetown.
sentences.chinese: 我接到過一名女士的電話，她想去開普敦。

sentences.english: Tiago scored twice at the Green Point Stadium in Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 在開普敦綠點球場內，蒂亞戈梅開二度。

sentences.english: The most crotchety judge in cape town.
sentences.chinese: 開普敦市脾氣最壞的法官。

sentences.english: On June 6, the ship completed the departure formalities and from the port of Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 6月6日，該船辦妥相關離港手續並駛離開普敦港。

sentences.english: 1795 - United Kingdom conquers Cape Town, South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 1795年的今天，英國佔領了南非的開普敦。

sentences.english: I travelled from Cairo to Cape Town in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 2002年，我從開羅一路旅行到了開普敦。

sentences.english: Hot Hout Bay is a beautiful place, 50 miles outside of Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 胡特灣是一個美麗的地方，在開普敦50米外。

sentences.english: Mexico City, Moscow and Cape Town are slated for restaurant openings this spring.
sentences.chinese: 今年春天將在墨西哥城，莫斯科和開普敦開設新餐館。

sentences.english: I could see the streets of cape town take form as the ship sailed into table bay.
sentences.chinese: 當船駛入桌灣時，我能逐漸看清開普敦市內的街道。

sentences.english: Hout Bay) is a beautiful place, 50 miles outside of Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: 豪特灣是個美麗的地方，位於開普敦50英里開外。

definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2
Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: to buy on a considerable scale/to purchase/to procure/to stock up
lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed/unaccompanied
Yangjiang prefecture level city in Guangdong
